name: Jumpy Party
description:
Relax and have fun with the little jumpy creatures! Simply touch the cute creatures that jump on your smart phone or pad to make them split. The more they split into, the more gold coins you get! Let’s party with Jumpy party!

●●Key Features●●

◎Multi-touch, easy entertainment. Get your fingers ready for super fun with the little cute creatures!
◎A variety of cute, jumpy characters waiting for you to collect them.
◎Plenty of accessories available for you to create your unique assortments. Put the accessories on your characters and share with your friends on Facebook!
◎Lots of wallpaper and scene options for you to choose at your preference.
◎Three awesome skills to make you invincible and maximize your gold coin bonus
◎Check your ranking at Game Center!
